TopicTitle: ASET AVONICS Compatibility with Airplane Plus

Articles.Content:
I was thinking about an enhanced iva for AirplanePlus Cockpits, much like DemonEin's Mod.

Also with working buttons and switches. This is just a suggestion. If there are any mods that do this, Please send the link.

I wanted the enhanced iva for the MK1 Non-Commerical Cockpit.

(maybe opening canopies?)

Thanks.

Maybe blackheart's next update for airplaneplus could do this possibly.
This discussion of add-ons has been moved to Add-on Discussions.
